summary: Different factions in WWII-era Holland race to find a stash of Nazi gold.
cast: Laurence Fox|Louis Dempsey|Lucy Gaskell|Coral Beed|Andrew Howard|Jack Dee|Neil Newbon|Nick Moran|Rafe Spall|Tommy Flanagan|Sean Pertwee|Billy Zane|Neil Jackson|Steve Speirs|Agathe de La Boulaye|David Ginola|Karel Roden|Alexander Skarsgård|Michael Madsen|Todd Spangler|Dave Evans|Justin Thomson|Gheorge Debre|Ioana Popescu|Diarmid Scrimshaw|Aoife Madden|Lauretta Lewis|Anton Rodgers|André Schneider|John White Abbott
title: El último asalto
